item.title: 'BLKNWS: Terms & Conditions' Director Kahlil Joseph
item.description: Those who know Kahlil Joseph's work have long been hoping he would make a feature film. The master of short form filmmaking, including collaborations with Kendrick Lamar and Beyonce, has turned his innovative YouTube remix news show "BLKNWS" into one of the most interesting films of the year. Kahlil shares how he made the transition to a feature, and discusses the rocky relationship the film had with A24, which ended up in Steven Soderberg stepping in to save the day... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/PMC3965722282

item.title: Hoodwinkers Abound
item.description:
Marketing critic Dr. Mara Einstein walks us through the ways in which brands act like cults, especially when it comes to recruiting and maintaining a loyal customer base. She is the author of Hoodwinked: How Marketers Use the Same Tactics as Cults and host of the Hoodwinked with Dr. Mara Einstein podcast. You'll fine her TikTok videos especially enlightening, so follow there.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/6658b69029c9180011547e68
